trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There were no other sightings in Mesa on or around July 30th 2009
Summary: bright blue light traveling from the west to the east.
divs: Sighting Detailstonight, July 30th, 2009: my wife and i were in the back yard. and as usual we were looking at the stars. we noticed a bright circluar object traveling from west to east. it was not blinking like a passenger jet or a personal airplane. this object traveled almost in a straight line, thought it did move up and down. the light did not blink like a passener jet or a private airplane. As we watched the circlular light travel from west to east, suddenly it got really bright and discharged a bright light to the southwest. once the other light was out of sight, the orignial object dimmed into nothingness. from years of star gazing, living near multiple airports, I and my wife know this was not a usual aircraft. this was the most fantastic celistial experience of our lives. we do believe in UFOs, whether man made or extraterristrial, and tonight we know we saw an extraterristrial object.
